relating to or consisting of humus (= dark earth made of decayed leaves and plants): This shrub should be planted in soil that is rich in humic matter.humic acid Pine needles take longer to decay than some other leaves, releasing humic acid over a longer period, but at a slower rate.
More examplesFewer examplesHumic substances are considered nature's own best medicine for plants and animals.In humic soils, bacteria and other microorganisms have evolved a complex organic chemistry.Our composts contain very high levels of humic acid and several beneficial species of microorganisms.
